member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.AmsClient.#ctor(TencentCloud.Common.Credential,System.String)
member.summary: Client constructor.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.AmsClient.#ctor(TencentCloud.Common.Credential,System.String,TencentCloud.Common.Profile.ClientProfile)
member.summary: Client Constructor.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.HitFlag
member.summary: This field is used to return whether the moderated content hit the moderation model. Valid values: 0 (**no**), 1 (**yes**). Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.Score
member.summary: This field is used to return the confidence under the current tag. Value range: 0 (**the lowest confidence**)–100 (**the highest confidence**), where a higher value indicates that the text is more likely to fall into the category of the current returned tag; for example, *Porn 99* indicates that the text is highly likely to be pornographic. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.Text
member.summary: This field is used to return the text information generated by recognizing an audio file with ASR. Audio files of up to **5 hours** can be recognized. If this limit is exceeded, an error will be reported by the API. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.Url
member.summary: This field is used to return the URL where audio segments are stored, which is valid for 1 day. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.Duration
member.summary: This field is used to return the length of an audio file in seconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.Extra
member.summary: This field is used to return additional information, and the returned information varies by customer or `Biztype`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.TextResults
member.summary: This field is used to return the detailed moderation result of the text generated by recognizing an audio file with ASR. For the specific result, see the detailed description of the `AudioResultDetailLanguageResult` data structure.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.MoanResults
member.summary: This field is used to return the detailed moan detection result of an audio file. For the specific result, see the detailed description of the `AudioResultDetailMoanResult` data structure.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.LanguageResults
member.summary: This field is used to return the detailed minor language detection result of an audio. For the specific result, see the detailed description of the `AudioResultDetailLanguageResult` data structure.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.SubLabel
member.summary: This field is used to return a subtag under the current tag (Lable). Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.RecognitionResults
member.summary: List of audio recognition results Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResult.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailLanguageResult.Label
member.summary: This field is used to return the language information. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailLanguageResult.Score
member.summary: This parameter is used to return the confidence under the current tag. Value range: 0 (**the lowest confidence**)–100 (**the highest confidence**), where a higher value indicates that the audio is more likely to fall into the category of the current returned language tag; Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailLanguageResult.StartTime
member.summary: This parameter is used to return the start time of the segment of an audio file under the corresponding language tag in milliseconds. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailLanguageResult.EndTime
member.summary: This parameter is used to return the end time of the segment of an audio file under the corresponding language tag in milliseconds. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailLanguageResult.SubLabelCode
member.summary: *This field is in beta test. Stay tuned* Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailLanguageResult.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailMoanResult.Label
member.summary: This field is used to return the type of the content to be detected. It is fixed at **Moan** here to call the moan detection feature. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailMoanResult.Score
member.summary: This field is used to return the confidence of moan detection. Value range: 0 (**the lowest confidence**)–100 (**the highest confidence**), where a higher value indicates that the audio is more likely to fall into the category of moan.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailMoanResult.StartTime
member.summary: This field is used to return the start time of the segment of an audio file under the corresponding moan tag in milliseconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailMoanResult.EndTime
member.summary: This field is used to return the end time of the segment of an audio file under the corresponding moan tag in milliseconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailMoanResult.SubLabelCode
member.summary: *This field is in beta test. Stay tuned*

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailMoanResult.SubLabel
member.summary: This field is used to return a subtag under the current tag (Lable). Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailMoanResult.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailTextResult.Keywords
member.summary: This field is used to return the keyword information hit by the text content recognized with ASR and indicate the specific cause of content non-compliance (such as "Friend me"). This parameter may have multiple returned values representing multiple hit keywords. If the returned value is empty, but `Score` is not empty, the maliciousness tag (Label) that corresponds to the recognition result derives from the returned value determined by the semantic model. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailTextResult.LibId
member.summary: This field is **valid only when `Label` is `Custom` (custom keyword)**. It is used to return the ID of the custom library for easier custom library management and configuration. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailTextResult.LibName
member.summary: This field is **valid only when `Label` is `Custom` (custom keyword)**. It is used to return the name of the custom library for easier custom library management and configuration. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailTextResult.Score
member.summary: This field is used to return the confidence under the current tag. Value range: 0 (**the lowest confidence**)–100 (**the highest confidence**), where a higher value indicates that the text is more likely to fall into the category of the current returned tag; for example, *Porn 99* indicates that the text is highly likely to be pornographic. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailTextResult.LibType
member.summary: This field is used to return the dictionary type of a custom keyword. Valid values: **1** (blocklist/allowlist), **2** (custom keyword dictionary). If no custom keyword dictionary is configured, the default value will be 1 (blocklist/allowlist).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailTextResult.SubLabel
member.summary: This field is used to return a subtag under the current tag (Lable). Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioResultDetailTextResult.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioSegments.OffsetTime
member.summary: This field is used to return the start time of an audio segment in seconds. For audio on demand files, this parameter indicates the time offset of the audio from the complete audio track, such as 0 (no offset), 5 (5 seconds after the start of the audio track), and 10 (10 seconds after the start of the audio track). For live audio stream files, this parameter returns the Unix timestamp of the start of the audio segment, such as `1594650717`. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioSegments.Result
member.summary: This field is used to return the specific moderation result of an audio segment. For details, see the description of the `AudioResult` data structure. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.AudioSegments.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.BucketInfo.Bucket
member.summary: This field indicates a bucket name in Tencent Cloud COS. For more information on buckets, see [Basic Concepts](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/436/44352?from_cn_redirect=1).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.BucketInfo.Region
member.summary: This field indicates a region where a Tencent Cloud managed data center is deployed. COS data is stored in buckets in these regions.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.BucketInfo.Object
member.summary: This field indicates an object key in Tencent Cloud COS. An object is stored in a bucket as a basic storage unit. You can manage objects through the Tencent Cloud console, API, or SDK. For more information on objects, see [Object Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/436/13324?from_cn_redirect=1).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.BucketInfo.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CancelTaskRequest.TaskId
member.summary: This field indicates the task ID (in the `Results` parameter) returned after an audio moderation task is created. It is used to identify the moderation task to be canceled.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CancelTaskRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CancelTaskResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CancelTaskResponse.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CreateAudioModerationTaskRequest.Type
member.summary: This field indicates the input audio moderation type. Valid values: **AUDIO** (audio on demand), **LIVE_AUDIO** (audio live streaming). Default value: AUDIO.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CreateAudioModerationTaskRequest.CallbackUrl
member.summary: This field is optional and indicates the address for receiving the moderation information callback in the default format of URL. After it is configured successfully, the non-compliant audio/video segments generated during moderation will be sent through this API. For the format of the returned callback content, see [Sample Callback Signature](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1219/53257?from_cn_redirect=1#.E7.A4.BA.E4.BE.8B2-.E5.9B.9E.E8.B0.83.E7.AD.BE.E5.90.8D.E7.A4.BA.E4.BE.8B)

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CreateAudioModerationTaskRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CreateAudioModerationTaskResponse.Results
member.summary: This field is used to return the task creation result. For the specific output content, see the detailed description of the `TaskResult` data structure. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CreateAudioModerationTaskResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.CreateAudioModerationTaskResponse.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailRequest.ShowAllSegments
member.summary: This boolean field indicates whether to display all audio segments. Valid values: True (yes), False (display only audio segments that hit the moderation rule). Default value: False.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.TaskId
member.summary: This field is used to return the task ID (in the `Results` parameter) after an audio moderation task is created. It is used to identify the moderation task for which to query the details. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.DataId
member.summary: This field is used to return the data ID parameter passed in within the `Tasks` parameter when the audio moderation API is called for easier data identification and management. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.BizType
member.summary: This field is used to return the `BizType` parameter passed in when the audio moderation API is called for easier data identification and management. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.Name
member.summary: This field is used to return the task name in the `TaskInput` parameter passed in when the audio moderation API is called for easier task identification and management. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.Type
member.summary: This field is used to return the audio moderation type passed in when the audio moderation API is called. Valid values: **AUDIO** (audio on demand), **LIVE_AUDIO** (audio live streaming). Default value: AUDIO. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.InputInfo
member.summary: This field is used to return the media content information of the moderation service, mainly including the input file type and access URL. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.AudioText
member.summary: This field is used to return the recognized text content of an audio file. **Up to the first 1,000 characters** can be recognized. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.ErrorType
member.summary: If the task status is `Error`, this field will return the error type; otherwise, null will be returned by default. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.ErrorDescription
member.summary: If the task status is `Error`, this field will return the error message; otherwise, null will be returned by default. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.CreatedAt
member.summary: This field is used to return the creation time of the queried task in ISO 8601 format. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.UpdatedAt
member.summary: This field is used to return the last update time of the queried task in ISO 8601 format. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.Label
member.summary: If the recognition result is normal, this parameter is returned with the value `Normal`. If malicious content is recognized, the tag with the highest priority in the result of `Labels` is returned. Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTaskDetailResponse.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTasksRequest.Limit
member.summary: This parameter indicates the number of tasks to be displayed on each page of the task list. **Default value: 10**.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTasksRequest.Filter
member.summary: This parameter indicates the input parameter of the task filter. You can filter tasks by business type, file type, processing suggestion, and task status. For the specific parameter content, see the detailed description of the `TaskFilter` data structure.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTasksRequest.PageToken
member.summary: This parameter indicates the `Token` information used during pagination. It is automatically generated by the system and will be passed to the next generated page for easy and fast pagination. When you turn to the last page, this field will be empty.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTasksRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTasksResponse.Total
member.summary: This field is used to return the total number of queried tasks in the format of `int` string. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTasksResponse.Data
member.summary: This field is used to return the detailed data of the tasks on the current page. For the specific output content, see the detailed description of the `TaskData` data structure. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.DescribeTasksResponse.PageToken
member.summary: This field is used to return the `Token` information used during pagination. member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.MediaInfo.Codecs
member.summary: This field is used to return the codec of the media file passed in, such as WAV, MP3, AAC, FLAC, AMR, 3GP, M4A, WMA, OGG, and APE.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.MediaInfo.Duration
member.summary: This field is used to return the segment length of the input streaming media file in seconds. It is **15 seconds by default** and is customizable.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.StorageInfo.Type
member.summary: This field indicates the file access type. Valid values: **URL** (resource link), **COS** (Tencent Cloud COS). It should correspond to the access type passed in and can be used for strict verification and quick identification of the access address. If you don't pass in this parameter, the default value will be `URL`, and the system will automatically determine the access address type.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.Tag.Name
member.summary: The value of this parameter varies by `Label`. When `Label` is `Teenager`, `Name` can be `Teenager`. When `Label` is `Gender`, `Name` can be `Male` and `Female`. Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.Tag.Score
member.summary: Confidence score. Value: 1 to 100. Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.

member.summary: Start time for the recognition (ms) Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.Tag.EndTime

member.summary: This field is used to return the ID of the audio moderation task data for subsequent query and management of moderation tasks. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskData.TaskId
member.summary: This field is used to return the ID of an audio moderation task for identification, query, and management of moderation tasks.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskData.Name
member.summary: This field is used to return the name of an audio moderation task for subsequent query and management of moderation tasks. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskData.BizType
member.summary: This field is used to return the `BizType` parameter passed in when the audio moderation API is called for easier data identification and management. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskData.Type
member.summary: This field is used to return the audio moderation type passed in when the audio moderation API is called. Valid values: **AUDIO** (audio on demand), **LIVE_AUDIO** (audio live streaming). Default value: AUDIO. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskData.MediaInfo
member.summary: Input information Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskData.CreatedAt
member.summary: This field is used to return the creation time of the queried task in ISO 8601 format.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskData.UpdatedAt

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskInput.Name
member.summary: This field is optional and indicates the name of an audio moderation task for subsequent query and management of moderation tasks.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskInput.Input
member.summary: This field is required and indicates the access parameter of the moderated file, which is used to get the moderated media file and contains the access type and address.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskLabel.Score
member.summary: This field is used to return the confidence under the current tag (Label). Value range: 0 (**the lowest confidence**)–100 (**the highest confidence**), where a higher value indicates that the text is more likely to fall into the category of the current returned tag; for example, *Porn 99* indicates that the text is highly likely to be pornographic, while *Porn 0* indicates that the text is not pornographic. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskLabel.SubLabel
member.summary: This field is used to return a subtag under the current tag (Lable). Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskLabel.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskResult.DataId
member.summary: This field is used to return the `DataId` passed in within the `TaskInput` structure when an audio moderation task is created. It is used to identify the specific moderation task. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskResult.TaskId
member.summary: This field is used to return the ID of an audio moderation task for identification, query, and management of moderation tasks. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskResult.Code
member.summary: This field is used to return the task creation status. If `OK` is returned, the task has been created successfully; if another value is returned, refer to the common error codes. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ams.V20201229.Models.TaskResult.Message
member.summary: **This field will take effect only when the returned value of `Code` is an error code**. It is used to return the error message. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
